twitch_info.title: I wanna Classic - 100% Difficulty Grinds - #1
twitch_info.description: The journey begins. I complete Tutorial, Classic, Night Cave, Dash Jump today in that order. I started working on Mini before stopping for the night.

message.body: awesome I beat all difficulties on the classics tage fast
twitch highlight is now being processed for the final boss :D
let me restart the game again
night cave boss frequently breaks the ost
you can probably tell by me doing difficulties that I done all clear already on stream
not very long on stream though surprisingly
this stage will take a while due to dumb deaths lmao
but honestly I'm not worried about the stage at all
it's the boss I'm worried about
the music didnt break this time LUL
music only breaks on teh boss if you die on them
it takes about 4 or so deaths to make it happen
can't believe I just bet night cave impossible
dash jump is the one thing I struggle on the most in this game so
we're in for a rough time tbh
you can jump over that?? LUL
I still didn't know I was good enough to beat night cave on impossible, still shocked
that didn't even take long at all
I think classic 100% is something I can actually do huh
it'll take a while of c ourse
oh no the kid stubbed his toe on a corner
the kid's face hit the block
finally out of the riveting gameplay tm section
impossible diff is going to be so hard
i think this music is going to haunt my nightmares
I think I'm definitely going to need to rebeat hard mode multiple times
before I can go further onthis one
this feels like save state gaming
at leas the boss has a banger track
gonna do hard again for that reason lmao
obvious what the hard saves are
I always forget to go donw
i havent used twitch in like, a year or more?
long time no see in here!
nothing in the interface looks like it changed
I know that's an insane goal
what does it imply to do
beat every level with less and less saves until beating all of them without saves
oh its like choosing impossible in each world?
beating this without saves sounds painful
oh the box with the cat?
but ye dash jump without saves is uh questionable
with the boss that can either be easy, hard, or impossible at random
the fuck did you die to
stubbed toe in the corner again *explodes violently*
this is how i feel when i stub my toe irl
but ye I have to beat every stage in every difficulty and impossible is one of them
of course its another toe stub LUL
so was this one just now
still need to improve hard mode before I do very hard on dash jump
definitely not ready for very hard yet as that'll only have 3 saves LUL
still not good enogh for very hard though
we're starting to look a lot better now
I didn't expect there to be 4 saves in very hard
this final boss is going to pose a problem in impossible isn't it
I always die to it at least once
that was a fast very hard, wow
is it time for the impossible
not yet, a couple more very hards are needed
that was a dumb death, but to be fair that spring is precise to land in
you can feel the improvement from earlier
I can't believe I've impossible cleared 4 levels today
night cave was the one I was most afraid of aside from under
under is going last because it's basically K3 EX level to do deathless
oh yeah, did you finish K3 EX?
I only have ex emperor left still
it's on hiatus while I improve
extra emperor miku is all taht remains
this is going to test your memory hard
dash jump was probably worse tbh
yeah mini is going to be a time
oops just need to remember that for next time :)
"oh yes, just need to remember EVERYTHING"
once you memorize everything this should be easier than dash jump
where you gotta time your shot as you fall down and you only get one chance
so basically similar to dash jumps preboss level :)
man these spike placements are so evil
its okay its memorized for next time
there aren't many who have 100% this game
oh you can go through the wall there just
I was missing the specific point you can
I think I'm gonna call it here after hard mode mini as I've been going for nearly 8 hours lmao
had I not guessed a spike would be left
I had to be left not right....
nah I do like this game a lot butmini area isn't good
p l e a s e
how long until the next save???
honestly I'm gonna call it here tonight, but it's been fun
nearly 40 hours in the game let's go
